labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The discord client get's highlighted as if you had the online status
data.expected_result: Your discord client shouldn't get highlighted in the taskbar while being DnD

data.steps_to_repro: - Have discord open in the background - Recieve a friend request
